title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are buildable files in the project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open Eclipse in the Java perspective.
2. Open a project that has no buildable files (e.g., only empty folders).
3. Right-click anywhere in the project explorer or editor.
4. Verify that the "Build" option in the context menu is enabled.
